title: Yasuo voice actor
body: So I main Yasuo so I know the make it quick quote. So Im playing darksiders right now and War said "This will be quick" and I was like bruh that sounds like Yasuo and turns out Liam O'Brien voices both of them.

replies.body: Yay!  Liam is also the voice of Illidan Stormrage!  If you are into D&D at all  - he plays a game every week on the Geek and Sundry Twitch channel with a bunch of similarly wonderful actors called Critical Role. :D

> [{quoted}](name=Riot OwleyCat,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=MypqmRqc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-05T05:12:19.666+0000)
>
> Yay!  Liam is also the voice of Illidan Stormrage!  If you are into D&D at all  - he plays a game every week on the Geek and Sundry Twitch channel with a bunch of similarly wonderful actors called Critical Role. :D

Lol nothing like recommending a show the day off the (probably) finale
Also Gaara, Ukitake, the Ghost unit, and so on.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot OwleyCat,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=MypqmRqc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-05T05:12:19.666+0000)
>
> Yay!  Liam is also the voice of Illidan Stormrage!  If you are into D&D at all  - he plays a game every week on the Geek and Sundry Twitch channel with a bunch of similarly wonderful actors called Critical Role. :D

I knew it! I heard some  warcraft 3 Illidan in that chaos skin xD

> [{quoted}](name=Riot OwleyCat,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=MypqmRqc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-05T05:12:19.666+0000)
>
> Yay!  Liam is also the voice of Illidan Stormrage!  If you are into D&D at all  - he plays a game every week on the Geek and Sundry Twitch channel with a bunch of similarly wonderful actors called Critical Role. :D

I actually would like to know because I have been wondering this for several years now. Who was the voice actor for Quinn
I think he also voices Infinite in the new Sonic Forces game

That feel when you find out Liam O'Brien voices a lot of your favorite edgelords. Kain, Yasuo, War, Illidan... 

"You are not prepared!!"
